titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a recess or adjournment of the Senate from January 6 or 7, 1993 to January 20, 1993, and an adjournment of the House from January 6, 1993 to January 20, 1993.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Provides for a recess or adjournment of the Senate from January 6 or 7, 1993, until January 20, 1993, and an adjournment of the House of Representatives from January 6, 1993, until January 20, 1993.
